claimpoints.name: ClaimPoints
message.claimpoints.command.help.add: Adds the northwest-corner coordinate of all claims in the specified GriefPrevention world as Xaero's Minimap waypoints in the active waypoint list.
message.claimpoints.command.help.clean: Removes all claim waypoints in the active waypoint list, that do not match a claim in the specified world.
message.claimpoints.command.help.update: Combines /cp add <world> and /cp clean <world>, and also updates claim waypoint size indicators.
message.claimpoints.command.help.waypoin: Permanently deletes all claim waypoints in the active waypoint list.
Disables (hides) all claim waypoints in the active waypoint list.
Sets the alias (symbol) of all claim waypoints to the specified value.
Sets the color of all claim waypoints to the specified value.
Sets the name format of all claim waypoints to the specified value. Note: the name format must contain %%‌d.
Enables (shows) all claim waypoints in the active waypoint list.
message.claimpoints.command.help.worlds: Lists the GriefPrevention worlds in which you have active claims, and stores them for future autocompletion.
message.claimpoints.installCloth: Install Cloth Config API to access mod options.
message.claimpoints.waypoint.alias.set: Set alias of all claim waypoints to '%s'
message.claimpoints.waypoint.color.error: '%s' is not a valid color ID
message.claimpoints.waypoint.color.set: Set color of all claim waypoints to '%s'
'%s' is not a valid name format. %%‌d placeholder required for claim size.
Set claim waypoint name format to '%s'
option.claimpoints.autocommands.commandD: Time between joining a server and running the first command. If commands are causing errors, try increasing this.
option.claimpoints.autocommands.commands: List of commands to run on joining a server from the list above.
List of IPs of servers on which to send commands.
option.claimpoints.griefprevention.claim: A regex pattern defining a claim line in the claim list message. Must contain 4 regex capturing groups: (world name), (x coordinate), (z coordinate), (block count).
option.claimpoints.griefprevention.comma: The command that you normally use to show the list of your claims.
option.claimpoints.griefprevention.descr: The fields below tell ClaimPoints how to detect and interpret the claim list message sent in chat by the GriefPrevention plugin in response to the command above. If the claim list message shows up in chat when you run a ClaimPoints command, it is not being read correctly and you will need to change one or more of these settings.
option.claimpoints.griefprevention.endin: Regex patterns defining lines of the claim list message that come after the last claim line.
option.claimpoints.griefprevention.first: A regex pattern defining the first line of the claim list message, prior to any claim lines
option.claimpoints.griefprevention.ignor: Regex patterns defining lines of the claim list message that are not start, end, or claim lines.
option.claimpoints.waypoints.alias.error: Alias must be either 1 or 2 characters
option.claimpoints.waypoints.alias.toolt: The alias for claim waypoints, shown in the icon.
option.claimpoints.waypoints.color.toolt: The color code for claim waypoint icons.
Name format must contain %%‌d for claim size
The format for claim waypoint names. Must contain %%‌d for the claim size.
